page.title: 15Home life contd.
page.content: 4.00p.m.Middle son arrives home and youngest sons friend arrives to play.4.10p.m prepare tea_peel potatoes chop leeks,and veg. for soup.Telephone call take message to husband. 5_5.45p.m.Tea for family and young friend.Chips,cold chicken and veg.Custard and ginger cake.Husband is late so his put to one side. Telephone call from mother to get shopping for her next day.Husband comes in for his tea.Clear table,husband goes out to mark sets for ploughing.Two of middle sons friends arrive. 5.45p.m.Get in washing,fold clothes and start ironing. 6.50p.m.Finish ironing and get ready to go to Sunday school teachers meeting at Blackhill. 7p.mTake youngest sons friend hom on way to Blackhill.Husband comes home to
